Metadata.Title: CVE-2020-19695 affecting package nginx for versions less than 1.22.1-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2020-19695 affecting package nginx for versions less than 1.22.1-5. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package nginx is earlier than 1.22.1-5, affected by CVE-2020-19695
